LanguageData.DecreeFailed.stages.decree_failed.label: decree failed
LanguageData.DecreeFailed.stages.decree_failed.descri: My noble authority has not been respected as it should be.
LanguageData.DecreeMet.stages.decree_satisfied.label: decree satisfied
LanguageData.DecreeMet.stages.decree_satisfied.descri: My noble authority has been respected as it should be.
LanguageData.Disinherited.stages.disinherited.label: disinherited
LanguageData.Disinherited.stages.disinherited.descrip: I was disinherited of my title. Do I need to get medieval on these people?
LanguageData.NeuroquakeEcho.stages.neuroquake_echo.de: Distant, unfamilliar echoes of terror and grief. It makes me feel nervous and shaky.
